text: Rimo-Cocoron (Japanese:リモココロン, Hepburn: Rimoco Colon) is an Action game, developed & published by SCEI, which was released in Japan in 2001. == Gameplay == Rimo-Cocoron is a point-and-click with action elements. == Trivia == * Original names: リモココロン (SCPS-11012) * Also known as Rimo-Cocoron Category:PlayStation 2 games Category:PlayStation 2-only games Category:2001 video games Category:Sony Interactive Entertainment games Category:Japan- exclusive video games Category:Action video games Category:Point-and-click adventure games
title: Rimo-Cocoron
